TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: Representa a chave privada do elemento .

span.span: Represents the private key of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe representa o `` elemento, que contém um chave pública.The class represents the `` element, which contains a public key. Use para identificar a chave pública que corresponde à chave privada que foi usado para criar a assinatura digital.Use to identify the public key that corresponds to the private key that was used to create the digital signature. Se uma chave não for fornecida explicitamente para o construtor, um novo par de chaves é gerado aleatoriamente.If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. O classe é usada com assinaturas XML.The class is used with XML signatures. Para obter mais informações sobre a especificação do W3C, consulte [sintaxe de assinatura XML e processamento versão 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).For more information about the W3C specification, see [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/). ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o classe na criptografia XML para criar uma assinatura desanexada.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create a detached signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#1)] O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o classe na criptografia XML para criar uma assinatura de envelope.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#1)]

summary.span: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe com uma nova chave pública gerada aleatoriamente.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new, randomly-generated public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ao criar um novo chave, este construtor usa a implementação padrão de conforme definido pelo classe.When creating a new key, this constructor uses the default implementation of as defined by the class.
